next_steps.note: "Write a first draft of at least one poem, focusing on free verse to establish a baseline.",
"Research 2-3 contemporary poets whose style resonates with the desired aesthetic for this project.",
"Create a document to track poem ideas, drafts, and revisions (e.g., a simple spreadsheet or dedicated writing software).",
"Define a target length or number of poems for the collection - a rough estimate is fine for now."
